results.content: The course I found extremely helpful with my studies. I have been studying Python to prepare me for lectures, but always found it too complex. This course broke it down for me and luckily it followed the same structure as my studies so keeping up was easy. Really enjoyed the course, could use more exercises, but I'm sure the exams will be enough!

results.content: The course is labeled as 'Advanced' but doesn't even cover widgets. This is something I'd expect out of a free course made by an amateur for fun. Awful!

response.content:
Be sure to note the course content in the course content tab. This contains a list of the video lectures and all the content that will be covered. Luckily, I don't include free basic content (such as widgets) in a paid advanced course, that would be unfair towards the students and be considered 'padding' to the content. It is good that there are free courses that can give you the basic content you desire.

Thank you for taking the course and hope when ready and able you can complete it.
